description: Try our easy to follow Gado Gado Salad With Peanut Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Gado Gado Salad With Peanut Sauce
name: Gado Gado Salad With Peanut Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put all the dressing ingredients in a saucepan and heat gently, stirring, until combined. Drizzle the dressing over the salad and serve immediately or serve the dressing as a dipping sauce for the salad.
